# mesh

**Instance Property**

The parent mesh containing the vertex data of this submesh.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var mesh: MTKMesh? { get }
```

## Discussion

The buffer of this parent mesh should be set in the encoder before a call to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderCommandEncoder/drawIndexedPrimitives(type:indexCount:indexType:indexBuffer:indexBufferOffset:)] is made.
